Title: Steven Floats
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven discovers he can float but must learn to control his power in order to get a fresh donut.
